website_summaries.verdict: One of the best deals you'll find for this amount of ovulation tests. If you have a long cycle and need to test more than most, these strips are a great bargain.
pros: Lower price than most other brands for the same amount of test strips
cons: Several buyers said they had some defective strips where the control line didn't show up

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great! While trying to conceive I bought these tests. Because the test strips were so inexpensive I tested often; I never received a false positive or a false negative. I tested about 15 days after my period, and the strip would show a faint line. I tested each day, twice a day (because I had so many strips) and each line showed darker than the previous, until the test line became equally as dark as the control line, which meant I was ovulating. Flash forward nine months, I now have a beautiful healthy baby boy! Good luck!!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Rhine

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend this product. I used this as well as the clear blue easy advance digital monitor (CBEADM). CBEADM showed I was ovulating but this did not. I even tested a couple more days out and never got a second line as dark as the control line. This was very frustrating because I have an irregular cycle and was hoping I could use this cheaper alternative to track my ovulation days. I'm not sure if this was a bad batch or not, but through my experience I would recommend just saving your money and purchasing a better monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: These are accurate and cost effective. Just collect the first urine of the day in a little cup and dip the test in. I'd recommend to start testing on CD 11 or earlier if you're not sure when you ovulate- Day 14 is standard for a 28 day cycle. Below is a picture of a negative test from the day before ovulation (CD14), a positive test on the day of ovulation (CD15), and a negative test the day after ovulation (CD16). I've already gotten pregnant twice with these strips so we're going for a third- good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Shootermcgavin

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great tests
customer_reviews.text: I thought I had a defective batch of tests but it turns out I just had a really late surge! These work great and the price is amazing, just bought another batch!
customer_reviews.author: Kristie

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately these are a bust for me. I’ve gone through about 15 of them (testing at the same time everyday) and they all look exactly the same. No difference of intensity in the test line in any of them. They’re all almost positive but not really. Never faint. Never positive. I tested with a dollar tree test to compare and there is a big difference (dollar tree is much fainter with a clearer result).
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Very thin strips, but they work
customer_reviews.text: This large pack allowed me to test the whole month. The reason I couldn't find my ovulation date with the packs that only had 10 strips in them is that apparently I ovulate way late in my cycle. These work perfectly, don't give up just keep testing. The only thing I wish was different is the strips are very narrow and sometimes hard to keep a hold of.
customer_reviews.author: QueenCashew

customer_reviews.title: Great for predicting irregular ovulation/cycle
customer_reviews.text: These are great for when you’re trying to figure out your ovulation date. It’s recommended to test twice a day so you don’t miss your window and it can get expensive with other brands. My cycle is longer than most and can be a little unpredictable. The price and accuracy make these a great choice. I thought they weren’t working at first but I ovulated late and they worked! Wham, bam, thank you ma’am, and now I’m pregnant!
customer_reviews.author: AReyOfSunshine

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: There is a good chance that it was my fault, but I was never able to use this product successfully. Through multiple cycles, I never detected a "positive" ovulation test. I did, however, eventually get pregnant without the support of this product. I highly recommend Clinical Guard pregnancy tests, as HCG is much easier to read.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these tests!
customer_reviews.text: These tests are very accurate. my first month of using these I got pregnant! I took my first test on february 16th and it was negative, on the 17th I had my first positive and then again on the 18th, so we had sex on the 17th and 18th and now I found out I'm 4 weeks pregnant expecting our little bundle of joy November 10th!
customer_reviews.author: SamMomaBear

customer_reviews.title: Control line faint!
customer_reviews.text: So I've used 3 tests so far, just received them yesterday but the control line hardly shows up which makes me think they are not valid. Not sure if I should keep trying to use them or just try and send them back. This really sucks as I recently had a miscarraige and was using these to track when i might be ovulating. This is disappointing because I've used this brand before and they worked great, these not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Elise Burk

customer_reviews.title: Reliable?
customer_reviews.text: They are very straight forward, easy to understand. I've seen a few other posts that report the positive line was not as dark the control line and they still ovulated. I had this same problem or at least I'm very confident of that. My bbt temperatures suggest I ovulated and all the other test strips I used were a clear negative. It may also be user error but I'm getting some tests done by my doc this month to see if I ovulated. I will update this post. Women know their bodies best and I'm pretty sure I did ovulate and I don't know if I would buy this brand again because I don't trust it's reliability.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great OPKs
customer_reviews.text: Ovulation strips can be hard to read but I have found these to be reliable and easier to read than some of the dollar store brands. These are a great value too. They helped me conceive both my babies and helped me not get pregnant when I didn’t want to.
customer_reviews.author: hayley wright

customer_reviews.title: crap tests find a different brand - multiple came without ...
customer_reviews.text: crap tests find a different brand - multiple came without sticks in the packages or looked chewed up by a dog. I wish I had kept some of the tests for photos as they all has multiple divits and little puncture spots on the actual wand. Multiple times I couldn't tell if there were evap lines or what due to how the strip had little divets everywhere.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to read
customer_reviews.text: I use them for tracking my ovulation. The control line hardly shows up & the test line itself is almost always invisible
customer_reviews.author: storyleann

customer_reviews.title: Clear, reliable, won’t give false positives
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried multiple ovulation test strips while trying to conceive, and I’ve been most impressed with the ClinicalGuard strips. Other brands tend to give me multiple days (sometimes 4 or more days) of positive OPK results. This makes pinpointing ovulation difficult. The ClincalGuard strips show me clearly when my LH level is surging right before ovulation AND when it is decreasing after I’ve ovulated. I finally became pregnant while using these strips. My only criticism is that these strips are very narrow and are therefore easy to drop. But the price is definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: abrownson

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Super easy to use, accurate and inexpensive. Once I started using these, we got pregnant (multiple times!) I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: wildflowers

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and cheap
customer_reviews.text: These get the job done. The strips are quite narrow (like a quarter of an inch) but if you know what you are looking for, they work. The control line is not very dark so when testing you are just looking to make sure the test line is as dark or possibly darker than the control line. This indicates that ovulation should occur within 12-48 hours. Only tracking Basel body temperature daily will tell of you have truly ovulated. That being said, these are cheap and accurate for poas addicts and women ttc or with fertility issues where you really need to track your cycles.
customer_reviews.author: C Roberts

customer_reviews.title: I recommend opting for Wondfo
customer_reviews.text: They work. The strips are very thin and irregularly cut. Not very high quality. Harder to read than some similar options at a very similar price point. If you need a large number of inexpensive OPK test strips, I recommend opting for Wondfo. They are usually only a couple bucks more for the same amount and are much higher quality and easier to read.
customer_reviews.author: theknitphomaniac

customer_reviews.title: These have been the best OPKs that I have tried since my husband and ...
customer_reviews.text: These have been the best OPKs that I have tried since my husband and I started trying to conceive nearly three years ago. They are consistently accurate with my cycle dates and have given me a much better understanding of my cycle in the last 4 months that we have used them. I received my FIRST ever positive OPK on these during my first month using them and it was later confirmed by bloods with my PCP. You really cant beat the quality for the price that you pay! I have purchased from Clinical Guard three or four times now and will definitely be ordering from them again!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Lasiter

customer_reviews.title: Great price for 50 oval test stripes- they do work !
customer_reviews.text: Used 4 stripe for 4 days (cycle dys was 10 - 14) for last month cycle, was negative & think I tested too late! About 3 months ago, had a positive test result! So, I know the test work ! Will update later in March: recovery from major surgery, so I know my cycle will be crazy this month ! Happy baby dusts ladies!!
customer_reviews.author: R. M.

customer_reviews.title: It works for some, but not me.
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for me. The clear blue easy fertility strips are way easier to read. I used these for three months and never got a positive strip. I used the clear blue easy and was able to see when I ovulated.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read peak positives versus high
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes fertility tracking is a pain. These are inexpensive, reliable, and ship fast. I’ve used several brands over the last 4 years and these are my favorite. They give me a clear positive when others were giving me several. I recommend for anyone who is trying and having a hard time reading with their current brand. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: MamatocoolbbV

customer_reviews.title: Best deal
customer_reviews.text: Great price!!! When you are testing everyday as to see when you should or shouldn’t be sexually active, these strips are accurate and very affordable. I would recommend getting a toilet hat so it’s easy to dip your test strip.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. green thumb

customer_reviews.title: Fine but not great
customer_reviews.text: These are very poorly made and even worse on the instructions. The outside displays something and when you open it, it looks like it’s for a completely different product.. it could just be more clear. But overall, not terrible for the price.
customer_reviews.author: SAMUEL PRUITT

customer_reviews.title: Easy & Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, no complaints. Very clearly indicated LH surge, it’s just important to collect urine in a cup and dip the strip in as opposed to holding it under a urine stream.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Work consistently
customer_reviews.text: Been TTC for 8 months so the bulk pack at a good price have helped us out. Obviously very basic but consistent and reliable results. Just be prepared to use your own little cup bc it is a dip stick not one you pee on.
customer_reviews.author: Philip J Zaubi

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. So easy to use and read. They totally work. Each day the color got darker. Inexpensive and you get a ton of them with your order. Save yourself money and time and buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: Soraya Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Must Use Cup
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and read. As the directions state, you must urinate in a cup and then dip the test into the cup. For pregnancy tests I usually just hold it in my stream but that work won’t for these. You have to pee in a cup.
customer_reviews.author: Roni Walton

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: We use this for NFP (Marquette model) and these work well enough for me. Since we have started using these I get an LH surge every cycle. I will continue to use these.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Valera

customer_reviews.title: Cost-effective ovulation testing
customer_reviews.text: Cost-effective means of finding out you're ovulating, particularly for those of us who don't have a set ovulation pattern. You could spend $10 - $15 for just a few tests...or you can get packs of 50 for around $10. These work just as well as the more expensive brands in my experiences, and allows for testing multiple times a day for those with short ovulation windows. I generally have a 10 day possible ovulation window, so these work well and last me for a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: And I'm pregnant now :) They showed me that I ovulated early on the month that I conceived and helped me find out that I had a luteal phase defect. Used these in conjunction with BBT and Vitamin B6 and B12 after ovulating.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy-V Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Ovulation Test Strips
customer_reviews.text: These truly work and I am satisfied with the results. I will never pay for the more pricier versions in the drug store again! I will purchase these from Amazon because of the fast shipping and the brand, Clinical Guard works well. Fast test results and very accurate. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me
customer_reviews.text: I got a faint line or no line when i was not ovulating but when I did ovulate, the line was very dark, almost burgundy. With that I made sure we did the BD and came out pregnant!
customer_reviews.author: Mari Z

customer_reviews.title: good product as it claims
customer_reviews.text: Tip: If you are not sure and need a control test, find an adult XY. It should show two bands by not very dark. Test 1-2x daily, you can catch the surge.
customer_reviews.author: Ywf2000

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like reading tea leaves. Maybe the truth is there. I sure can’t make sense of it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: So convenient
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product! The good... Easy to use and very inexpensive. When you are trying to conceive you need a reliable way of tracking your ovulation and this makes it so simple. No need to graph your temperature every single day.. This easy test tells you within minutes. So easy to use, convenient and perfectly packaged. Used these are conceived my baby on our 3rd try! The not so good.. Can't really find anything to list, it's a great product! Will use again when trying for our second.
customer_reviews.author: Kchav

customer_reviews.title: Super price and accurate!
customer_reviews.text: Was spending so much money on ovulation testing strips in grocery store until a friend told me about these. Super easy to use! Accurate results! Super affordable!
customer_reviews.author: J Demaree

customer_reviews.title: Shop around
customer_reviews.text: So I bought these and my husband different bought ones. I used the same cup of urine for both test.... these barely even showed, even during peak. I gave it two different cycles but still never improved. The test my husband bought work so much better.. We used these previously and they worked great. Maybe a bad batch. I don’t recommend this time.
customer_reviews.author: Alli Scu

customer_reviews.title: Not very good.
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes it doesn’t even work. Instructions say dip it in urine for 3 seconds. That’s totally false. It leaves you with incomplete test. I’ll dip it for probably around 8 seconds just to make the test work. But I’m wondering if that affects the validity of the results. I haven’t gotten a positive in 2 months with these. I guess I could be missing my window. But other brands I’ve used I’d get blazing positives for a couple days. Idk. I won’t be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: When I feel like I am getting a positive on this test strip
customer_reviews.text: These really work well. I use these in combination with the Clearblue OPK's, but the Clearblue ones are so expensive. I have very irregular cycles and use these test strips daily until I think it is positive. When I feel like I am getting a positive on this test strip, I use the Clearblue OPK to get a more definite answer. Would definitely buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: JY

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: The order arrived on time, as expected. I did use it the first week and am happy at the ease of the instruction. I am not sure yet if it works, but my Partner and I are using this to time when we should try. We are giving this a three month test and will provide an update.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Good quantity for the price
customer_reviews.text: I couldnt tell you if it was the product or if it was my body but I used for a few months and never got one positive ovulation.
customer_reviews.author: Amber piekarski

customer_reviews.title: Bad Batch?
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered this product before and have been incredibly happy with it. It’s always been super clear and easy to read. This last shipment seems to be defective. The negative lines barely show at all up and a positive line never showed up through the time when it should have. Not sure if I just got a “bad batch.” But I prefer not to have uncertain readings in products like these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Always Accurate
customer_reviews.text: My favorite LH tests to use by far!!! Definitely recommend to use the PreMom app along with tracking ovulation by test strips.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Hafner

customer_reviews.title: Won’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: These are terrible OPK’s. I bought them instead of another brand I usually get, and was severely disappointed. Half the time there was no line at all, and I ended up returning my order. I’ll stick with what I usually buy even if they’re more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. I was using a different brand and could easily track my ovulation. I decided to buy these to try, since they were lower priced. I've gone through half of the strips over several cycles and feel that the test line is SO faint that I cannot tell whether or not it is actually there or not! I will be throwing these away and going back to the slightly more expensive version I ordered on Amazon before. Very disappointed and feel like I wasted so much time and money on these.
customer_reviews.author: J. Yeld

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: These are an excellent value. I was getting so sick of buying OPKs at the store and wasting money. When you test frequently leading up to when you expect to ovulate, the cost adds up quickly, especially if you have very irregular cycles. I think these work just as well and I trust the results. In fact, I had my first EVER positive OPK test using these strips versus the brands you find at the drugstore. I hope I don't have to, but I would definitely purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: lt

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with this product and how easy and reliable it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time purchasing ovulation test strips. I have to say the directions are very clear as well as the results. The test strips are packed individually and they arrive altogether in a ziplock bag. I would suggest buying small cups to pee in to make it easier to test the strip. Overall, I am happy with this product and how easy and reliable it is.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Its okay, not the best
customer_reviews.text: So this doesn't get as dark as other opks. But it does get positive. I'd say this is 3 1/2 stars not 4. As it takes a while for it to get dark compared to my other opks
customer_reviews.author: Anela

customer_reviews.title: You may always get 2 lines doesn't mean positive
customer_reviews.text: I used these and got pregnant the first cycle trying. Unfortunately I did miscarry but these work magic & are easy to read. I always got 2 lines but was not ovulating until it showed the test line as dark as or control line.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley W

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. I'm using it everyday I'm suppose to and I'm not sure if it is accurate or not. Next cycle I am switching to the ClearBlue advanced digital and using those from now on. I wish I could trust this product more, but I've already had to redo some because some on the tests didn't work at all and I am impatient and want to have a baby. I feel these aren't very accurate. I know every woman is different, so this may not have worked for me, but doesn't mean it won't work for you.
customer_reviews.author: TheAntonia

customer_reviews.title: Useful!
customer_reviews.text: I'm using these in conjunction with the Natural Cycles app to prevent pregnancy but you can use them together for TTC. It took me a couple of cycles to get the hang of how to read the lines since they don't get as dark (for me) as the packaging indicates. That being said my positive day(s) match up with my app predictions! It's normal for some women to have a 2-day surge so don't worry if that happens for you too!
customer_reviews.author: Sadhaka

customer_reviews.title: Used to be decent
customer_reviews.text: I have used these before and they worked ok. This time I ordered again several years later and every test comes out positive. I tried 2 different and very expensive clear blue tests and they were both negative. I think I got a defective pack.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and work!
customer_reviews.text: Love that these are so affordable! I don't mind taking a test whenever I want.
customer_reviews.author: FamilyShopper

customer_reviews.title: Convenient to use
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad to have found a reliable and yet less expensive bulk option for ovulation tests! I can pop one in my puse and take it with me if for whatever reason I have to test outside of my home. I only wish that they weren't individually wrapped because I feel bad about using the plastic, but at the same time, that is part of the convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Savanah Thibaudeau

customer_reviews.title: Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure these worked for me. But, they are a great deal compared to other test kits!
customer_reviews.author: ERM

customer_reviews.title: Works well for my wife.
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses them and would recommend these. There easy to use and no duds. Can easily track progress in ovulation.
customer_reviews.author: Duane Spears

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great value due to having fertility issues I need to check constantly. This is a product that really helps.
customer_reviews.author: SouthLaneDesigns

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: Though this product is inexpensive. I’m upset, getting pregnant isn’t always easy.. but this just frustrated me. The readings are so off what a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: It is Ok Product in quality. sometimes feel the ...
customer_reviews.text: It is Ok Product in quality. sometimes feel the line is weak.But I use a lot strip and it is very economic for daily testing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, helpful and accurate!
customer_reviews.text: These have been very helpful and accurate in pinpointing ovulation day. They helped me get pregnant!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: I have never used the expensive PKOs, but these have always worked for me. They tell me a day before the rest of my symptoms show up.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M.

customer_reviews.title: This is the third time I have bought these. ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the third time I have bought these. Round one I only bought a small bag. Round 2 I ended up getting pregnant. Now round three to try again.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Bugge

customer_reviews.title: Works but harder to read result line
customer_reviews.text: They’re easy to use I’ll give it that but they definitely are harder to read but still work . I’ve not tried them for long enough to differentiate between the months & darkness of the line. It does seem to work though and gets darker and lighter before and after ovulation
customer_reviews.author: Erika T.

customer_reviews.title: So far no duds
customer_reviews.text: I've used about 15 of the strips and have not had an invalid result or any other issues with the product. The position of the test and control strips on these is different from other brands I've used before. I think I prefer the others more. The orientation of the strip on the package illustration is upside down from the way you would hold it. That's just something that's personally irritating to me - it feels backwards.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Great ovulation tracker!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these after I ran low on my Wondfo ovulation test strips and worked just as great. I conceived soon after with the help of these and the wondfo strips and using an ovulation tracker app. Expecting my bundle of joy in Feb 2017!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Summer09

customer_reviews.title: Get these, they work!
customer_reviews.text: I started testing the day after my period ended. 12 days later I got a positive result that I was ovulating. I was still breast feeding my one year old so I wasn't sure if I was ovulating. Glad to see the results! Holding for another little one soon!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Salinas

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive OPKs
customer_reviews.text: Very reliable brand. Have been buying this brand for a few years. Still haven’t been lucky but they work well.
customer_reviews.author: I_love_owls

customer_reviews.title: Good price for VERY poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: In every single one of these test strips that I have used (and I have tried a large number of them) the control line is so light as to be barely visible. The test line is at least as light. It is not really possible to tell whether the tests are valid or not.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Knight

customer_reviews.title: Good test strips for the cost.
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says it does. I am mainly using this as a natural family planning effort, so It is useful to see when ovulation occurs. Be consistent about the time you use it and wait the alloted time to read results. It is a good value for the amount of strips.
customer_reviews.author: Em S

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me (invalid)
customer_reviews.text: Got my package of clinical guard ovulation test strips. I tried them out and I am super disappointed. The first test came back invalid (only control line) so I tried another test and same issue. What a waste of $$$
customer_reviews.author: M Francis

customer_reviews.title: Work great & affordable
customer_reviews.text: I like that these are very skinny so I can tape them on a piece of paper and track my ovulation period. I test every 12 hours to be sure not to miss it so the price for how many I use is awesome also!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: BEST BUY
customer_reviews.text: This product is the best buy for your money. The individually wrapped tests are perfect, and each one comes with instructions in case you forgot from the test before. You see results in as little as 6 seconds (3 secs in urine and 3 seconds out). I will continue to buy these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, yet super accurate product.
customer_reviews.text: I use these in conjunction with the FertilityFriend app. Simple, easy to use, and accurate. I also take my BBT every morning to confirm the strips’ responses. Been accurate every time. They’re economical too.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Ingber

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: The cost on these are hard to beat. I do agree they are a little confusing. Since they are inexpensive, I've found it is best to test multiple times a day and keep them for comparison.
customer_reviews.author: ARRE

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: They don't work as well as a more expensive ovulation test, but when you're needing a cheap alternative, they get the job done. I use these through the whole month when needed, but usually for about 4 days before and after predicted ovulation to make sure it is going like it should. During predicted ovulation though, I use a more expensive product to try and better pinpoint that exact moment.
customer_reviews.author: Grace McClerren

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for me. I always got negative results but recently found out I am pregnant. Seems like it works for some people but not all.
customer_reviews.author: K44T

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: They did what I needed them to do😊 I use clear blue digital as well but only wanted to use them when I was much closer to ovulation and these strips did it. These started fading on CD 13 which I think I must have ovulated because I had a solid smiley as well as solid on these tests on CD12. Hopefully I conceived this month!
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market!
customer_reviews.text: As Always, these things always catch when I'm ovulating and continue to be easy to use and reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: These are very easy to use and results are pretty clear. Ideally, you should track your ovulation by using these twice daily and keeping them to refer back to. I've only been using them for about a week, but could narrow down the ovulation window to one day.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: environmentally friendly
customer_reviews.text: I love that these test strips don't have hard plastic packages for each one. This model is so much more environmentally friendly! And is accurate!
customer_reviews.author: mrklingler

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product!!
customer_reviews.text: They work exactly how they are supposed to! You do need to wait the full 5 mins to get an accurate reading. I found it was best to take the test at the same time every day. Keeping my fingers crossed for a positive pregnancy test! Would definitely use again! Cheap and accurate way to track ovulation!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: I ordered these and am a first time OPK user ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these and am a first time OPK user. I have yet to get a positive, but out of about 7 only one was invalid. I will update once I get a positive and continue to track my cycles.
customer_reviews.author: breyes

customer_reviews.title: and easy to read
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my wife. They're inexpensive, individually sealed, and easy to read. She likes them.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Love how inexpensive and easy to use these are
customer_reviews.text: Love how inexpensive and easy to use these are. Took one star off because although I've gotten a significantly darker line than previous tests, I've never received a super clear positive. Been using for 2 months. I've been counting the significantly darker lines as a positive.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: I liked the product
customer_reviews.text: I liked the product. They sent me 2x as many by accident but not a bad thing lol the lines showed up in the time limit I kept getting positive and realized it's because I was pregnant so really I had no experience using them for ovulation
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I’m only giving this product one star because it wouldn’t allow me to give it zero stars. After using this product, I found that it provides false readings. I compared it with two other products and found that they were reading when the clinical guard was not. If you want a good ovulation year, choose Clearblue. I almost missed my chance because these strips didn’t read when my LH surge was happening.
customer_reviews.author: Ryann

customer_reviews.title: Super easy and super cost effective.
customer_reviews.text: They are very simply test strips.Just the strip, you need the cup. Dip for 3 secs results in 5 min. So easy and so much easier and cost effective to track ovulation. Forget that basal thermometer, or any of the costly apps out there.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Not pregnant yet but these have helped in tracking the best days to try. Easy to use which is great for me
customer_reviews.author: aglass

customer_reviews.title: doctor recommended
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by my fertility doctor. We purchased before leaving her office and they were delivered that same day! Easy to use. Convenient to carry.
customer_reviews.author: squirlgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great price and work well
customer_reviews.text: Great price and work well. Better than buying the expensive kits each month of you're doing fertility treatment or if it's just taking awhile. Used this for current pregnancy and it was spot on. Sure made trying to conceive a lot easier! Know when it's time and you're done!
customer_reviews.author: Justin S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. Why spend a ton of money on the name brand ones?
customer_reviews.author: clt716

customer_reviews.title: Cost effective charting method
customer_reviews.text: This is a cost effective way to chart ovulation when TTC. I have been using these for months and will continue to use until we conceive. They clearly show ovulation peaks.
customer_reviews.author: NTreesh

customer_reviews.title: Accurate, Cheap, Easy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and accurate. Very bright, easy to read results. Key for those who struggle with infertility; excellent for those with PCOS who may have strange ovulation patterns or no ovulation at all without medications.
customer_reviews.author: zachary

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Worked great I suggest testing at least 2 times a day so you don't miss got pregnant first month
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: I wont be buying again..... giant waste
customer_reviews.text: I honestly wish i could get my money back. they are less effective, and hard to read compared to other brands ive used.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Brown

customer_reviews.title: A must for TTC
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Makes me understand my cycle so much better! It’s still too early to take a pregnancy test but so far these test strips have worked great!!
customer_reviews.author: Marlo

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second month using these strips. I like them. I only wish they weren’t individually packaged. Seems like a waste of packaging!
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: These opk's were useless. I compared them to a higher quality opk ...
customer_reviews.text: These opk's were useless. I compared them to a higher quality opk I bought as well and these never detected my surge. I absolutely and verifiably ovulated, but I never would have known in time for ttc if I had relied on these. Save your money-buy some that actually work.
customer_reviews.author: Card Recipient

customer_reviews.title: Not as accurate as Clearblue!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to track ovulation as we are trying for our 4th child. They are not nearly as strong or clear as my clear blue ovulation kit tests. Clear blue has giving me positives and these are still negative. Won't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Haley W.

product_meta.title: ClinicalGuard® Ovulation Test Strips (Individually-Sealed, Pack of 50)
product_meta.description: ClinicalGuard ovulation test strips are an accurate, affordable and consistently reliable test for women who wish to track their most fertile days without breaking the bank. Each test is individually sealed to ensure for quality, and are designed to detect trace amounts of Luteinizing Hormone - or LH - that are normally secreted in trace amounts throughout a woman's menstrual cycle. After a positive result is given, ovulation will typically occur after 24-48 hours.
feature_bullets: FAST and ACCURATE ovulation tests that don't break the bank
Large package quantity can help give women a greater chance of predicting when they are fertile
ClinicalGuard ovulation test strips have a sensitivity of 25 miU, or 25ng/L
Easy to Read - Simply immerse the ovulation test in a sample of urine up to the MAX line of the test, lay flat, and wait. Test results should appear within 5 minutes.
A positive result will display a fully saturated colored test band beneath the control line; negative results will not display a color under the control band.
